name: v0.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* fix a bug in `fenv init - --shell=fish` by @powdream in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/41
* Bump regex from 1.8.3 to 1.8.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/43
* Bump chrono from 0.4.25 to 0.4.26 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/44
* Bump serde from 1.0.163 to 1.0.164 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/48
* Bump clap_complete from 4.3.0 to 4.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/42
* Bump clap from 4.3.0 to 4.3.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/51
* Bump log from 0.4.18 to 0.4.19 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/49
* Bump tempfile from 3.5.0 to 3.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/47
* Bump quick-xml from 0.28.2 to 0.29.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/52
* Bump clap from 4.3.4 to 4.3.14 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/61
* Bump regex from 1.8.4 to 1.9.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/57
* Bump serde_json from 1.0.96 to 1.0.100 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/60
* Bump serde from 1.0.164 to 1.0.171 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/58
* Bump indoc from 2.0.1 to 2.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/64
* Bump serde_json from 1.0.99 to 1.0.105 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/72
* Bump clap from 4.3.14 to 4.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/76
* Bump serde from 1.0.171 to 1.0.188 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/77
* Bump clap from 4.3.14 to 4.4.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/78
* Bump tempfile from 3.6.0 to 3.8.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/73
* Bump regex from 1.9.1 to 1.9.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/88
* Bump clap_complete from 4.3.1 to 4.4.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/87
* Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 in /.github/workflows by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/80
* Bump anyhow from 1.0.71 to 1.0.75 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/85
* Bump quick-xml from 0.29.0 to 0.30.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/82
* Bump log from 0.4.19 to 0.4.20 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/89
* Bump indoc from 2.0.3 to 2.0.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/90
* Bump mockall from 0.11.4 to 0.12.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/102
* Bump serde from 1.0.188 to 1.0.196 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/101
* Bump codecov/codecov-action from 3 to 4 in /.github/workflows by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/103
* Bump anyhow from 1.0.75 to 1.0.79 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/100
* Bump serde_json from 1.0.105 to 1.0.113 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/104
* Bump quick-xml from 0.30.0 to 0.31.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/106
* Bump softprops/action-gh-release from 1 to 2 in /.github/workflows by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/110
* Bump anyhow from 1.0.79 to 1.0.81 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/112
* Bump regex from 1.9.6 to 1.10.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/114
* Bump clap from 4.4.2 to 4.5.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/115
* Bump nix from 0.26.2 to 0.28.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/109
* Enable `merge queue` feature by @powdream in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/116
* Tweak rust.yml by @powdream in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/127
* Add the status-check job by @powdream in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/128
* chore: bump up packages by @powdream in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/159
* feat: add `os` and `arch` fields to `FenvContext` by @powdream in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/125
* ci: use other code coverage tool instead of codecov by @powdream in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/163
* feat: add Flutter SDK download URL generator by @powdream in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/164
* chore(ci): move code coverage to ubuntu by @powdream in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/165
* Bump rand from 0.8.5 to 0.9.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/169
* feat: implement Flutter SDK download via URL by @powdream in https://github.com/fenv-org/fenv/pull/166


**Full Changelog**: v0.1.2...v0.2.0
